name: Invasion of the Zombie Monsters
description: Invasion of the Zombie Monsters is a fast 2D side-scrolling platformer. A couple is enjoying a relaxing evening. Suddenly there is a flash of light and Ned's girlfriend Linda is gone, an evil shadow has kidnapped her. When the town and surrounding land is falling into darkness, the bright moon casts a spell over Ned. He feels powerful, now he can battle the monsters and get Linda back.
alsoFor: Amstrad CPC, ZX Spectrum | Combined View
